value.latex:
On pose :
$f(x) = 1/(1+x)$,
$g(x) = e^{-x}$,
$h(x)  = \sqrt{1-2\sin x}$,
$k(x)  = \cos(\sqrt{2x})$.

Préciser les positions relatives de $\mathcal{C}_f$, $\mathcal{C}_g$, $\mathcal{C}_h$, $\mathcal{C}_k$ au voisinage
de $0$.
value.html:
On pose : \(f(x) = 1/(1+x)\), \(g(x) = e^{-x}\), \(h(x) = \sqrt{1-2\sin x}\), \(k(x) = \cos(\sqrt{2x})\).

Préciser les positions relatives de \(\mathcal{C}_f\), \(\mathcal{C}_g\), \(\mathcal{C}_h\), \(\mathcal{C}_k\) au voisinage de \(0\).
